aboutNutricionText1: Our Nutritional Plan Generator first estimates your Total Daily Energy Expenditure (TDEE) â€“ the calories your body needs daily. For example, if your Estimated TDEE is 2066 calories, this becomes your Target Calories. The generator then breaks down these calories into recommended macronutrients: Protein (e.g., 140g), Fat (e.g., 57g), and Carbohydrates (e.g., 247g), to help you achieve your dietary goals.
ExtraActive: Extra Active (very hard exercise/physical job or training twice a day)
enterAllYourDetails: Please enter all your details in the BMI Calculator section first.
InvalidUserData: Invalid user data. Please check your inputs.
validAgeError: Please enter a valid age between 2 and 120
increasedRiskHeartDisease: Increased risk of developing heart disease
highRiskHeartDiseaseStroke: High risk of heart disease and stroke
higherRiskFrailtyFalls: Higher risk of frailty and falls
disclaimer: Note: This is general guidance. Please consult a healthcare professional for personalized advice.
aboutBMIText1: Body Mass Index (BMI) is a numerical value calculated from a person's weight and height. It provides a simple way to categorize a person's weight relative to their height.
aboutBMIText2: The BMI classifications are based on World Health Organization standards:
limitationsText: BMI doesn't account for body composition (muscle vs. fat), age, gender, ethnicity, or fitness level. It's a screening tool and not a diagnostic measurement.
